name: Eye Eye Eye!
description:
Survive for as long as you can in a dangerous pocket dimension by leeching energy off of the frickin' evil eye monster that lives there.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD / Arrow keys
  • Attack - Left click / X / Space
  • Use up and down to control your falling speed
  • Hold attack for a charged spin attack, and follow up with a dash attack!

Made in 72 hours for MiniJam: 113, 'Final Boss'. The limitation was 'stuck in a loop', so you're trapped in a wrapping pocket dimension.

Features:

  • Juicy jump n' slash gameplay!
  • A frickin' evil eye monster, attack it to keep your energy high and not die!
  • 4 hastily drawn cards that make your life harder! (Look at this fun pack opening animation, ooOoOOoohh)

I don't think I did this quite right, the difficulty feels weird. It's fun though! looks nice too. The music isn't my best, and I didn't get around to adding any kind of settings.
